title-group.article-title: Whose Wealth To Maximixe: A Survey Of Alternative Views On Corporate Objective

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 1997 Journal of Financial Education, Jean L. Heck

abstract.p: This paper surveys alternative views to the traditional concept of shareholders' wealth maximization (SWM) as the ultimate goal of the firm. The survey finds that the alternative views are advanced not to completely replace the idea of SWM but to contend that firms should now try to accommodate the interests of non-shareholder constituencies along with SWM. Most of the alternative views are found to be largely inoperational due to the lack of workable mechanisms or tangible measures. However, as corporate management is becoming more diverse, multi-functional, and cross-cultural, some of the alternative ideas merit further exploration and need to be introduced to the students in today's finance classes.
